com.github.robtimus.checkstyle.checks

Class LicenseCommentCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AutomaticBean
      • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AbstractViolationReporter
        • com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AbstractFileSetCheck
          • com.github.robtimus.checkstyle.checks.LicenseCommentCheck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.Configurable, com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.Contextualizable, com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.FileSetCheck

    public class LicenseCommentCheck
extends com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.AbstractFileSetCheck
    Checks whether or not a Java source file has a valid leading license comment.

    A leading license comment is valid if (in order):

    • It contains the name of the file if and only if setIncludeFilename(boolean) has been called.
    • It contains a valid copyright notice if and only if setIncludeCopyright(boolean) has been called. Calling setRequiredCopyrightYear(String) and setRequiredCopyrightHolder(String) imply this.
    • There is an empty line before the remainder of the license text if and only if setIncludeEmptyLineBeforeLicenseText(boolean) has been called.
    • The remainder of the license text is valid according to what's been set with either setPredefinedLicenseText(String) or setCustomLicenseText(String).
    Author:
    Rob Spoor

      • setIncludeFilename

        public final void setIncludeFilename(boolean includeFilename)
        Sets whether or not the license comment must include the filename. Defaults to false.
        Parameters:
        includeFilename - true if the license comment must include the filename, or false if it's not allowed.

      • setIncludeCopyright

        public final void setIncludeCopyright(boolean includeCopyright)
        Sets whether or not the license comment must include a copyright. Defaults to false.
        Parameters:

      • setRequiredCopyrightYear

        public final void setRequiredCopyrightYear(String requiredCopyrightYear)
        Sets the required copyright year. If set to a non-blank value, will require a copyright notice.
        Parameters:
        requiredCopyrightYear - The required copyright year; current for the current year.

      • setRequiredCopyrightHolder

        public final void setRequiredCopyrightHolder(String requiredCopyrightHolder)
        Sets the required copyright holder. If set to a non-blank value, will require a copyright notice.
        Parameters:
        requiredCopyrightHolder - The required copyright holder.

      • setIncludeEmptyLineBeforeLicenseText

        public final void setIncludeEmptyLineBeforeLicenseText(boolean includeEmptyLineBeforeLicenseText)

        Parameters:
        includeEmptyLineBeforeLicenseText - true if the license comment must include an empty line, or false if it's not allowed.

      • setPredefinedLicenseText

        public final void setPredefinedLicenseText(String predefinedLicense)
        Sets the expected predefined license. This must be one of the following:
        • Apache-2.0: the Apache License 2.0
        • BSD-2-Clause: the 2-Clause BSD License / FreeBSD License / Simplified BSD License
        • EPL-1.0: the Eclipse Public License 1.0
        • EPL-2.0: the Eclipse Public License 2.0
        • GPL-2.0: the GNU General Public License version 2
        • GPL-3.0: the GNU General Public License version 3
        • LGPL-2.0: the GNU Library General Public License version 2
        • LGPL-2.1: the GNU Lesser General Public License version 2.1
        • MIT: the MIT License
        • MPL-2.0: the Mozilla Public License 2.0
        Parameters:
        predefinedLicense - The expected predefined license.

      • setCustomLicenseText

        public void setCustomLicenseText(String customLicenseText)
        Sets the expected license text.
        Parameters:
        customLicenseText - The expected license text.
